threats.title: AD01 Broken Authentication (from flow1)
threats.description: No authentication or broken (weak) authentication by the cloud application (because of flow1)

threats.title: AD02 Broken Access Control (from flow1)
threats.description: No access control, broken (weak) access control, and the authorization issues of the cloud application (because of flow1)

threats.title: AD03 Data Breach By Cloud Application (from flow1)
threats.description: Data breach (information disclosure) by the cloud application (because of flow1)

threats.title: AD04 Data Loss By Cloud Application (from flow1)
threats.description: Data loss (modification) by the cloud application (because of flow1)

threats.title: AD05 Backup Of Cloud Application Lost (from flow1)
threats.description: Lost of cloud application backup (because of flow1)

threats.title: AD06 Backup Of Cloud Application Stolen (from flow1)
threats.description: Disclosure of cloud application backups (because of flow1)

threats.title: AD07 Logs Of Cloud Application Lost (from flow1)
threats.description: Lost of cloud application logs (because of flow1)

threats.title: AD08 Logs Of Cloud Application Stolen (from flow1)
threats.description: Disclosure of sensitive information from cloud application logs (because of flow1)

threats.title: AE01 DDoS Attack To Cloud Application (from flow1)
threats.description: DDoS/DoS attack against cloud application from the Internet (because of flow1)

threats.title: AE02 EDoS Attack To Cloud Application (from flow1)
threats.description: EDoS (Economic Denial of Sustainability or Economic Denial of Service) attack against cloud application from the Internet (because of flow1)

threats.title: AE03 Network Attacks To Cloud Application (from flow1)
threats.description: Remote side can perform remote malicious activities based on misconfiguration or vulnerabilities of the cloud application (because of flow1)

threats.title: AE04 Cloud Application Abuse (from flow1)
threats.description: Malicious usage (abuse) of cloud application from the Internet (e.g. sending spam, participating botnet, mining) after gain control on it (because of flow1)

threats.title: AE05 Block Shared Resources Of Cloud Application (from flow1)
threats.description: Blocking shared resources of cloud application (e.g. shared external IP) by a third-part reputation service (because of flow1)

threats.title: AE06 Disclosure Of Credentials Of Cloud Management Interface (from flow1)
threats.description: Disclosure of user credentials of management interface of cloud application (because of flow1)

threats.title: BA01 Malicious Insider In Cloud Infrastructure (from flow2)
threats.description: Malicious insider in cloud infrastructure causes security issues of cloud application (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA02 Lack Of Reserved Resources For Cloud Application (from flow2)
threats.description: Lack of reserved resources for cloud application because of overload of cloud infrastructure (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA03 Failure Of Resource Scaling For Cloud Application (from flow2)
threats.description: Unexpected failure of resource scaling for cloud application (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA04 Hidden Dependencies Of Cloud Infrastructure (from flow2)
threats.description: Hidden dependencies between components of cloud application and cloud infrastructure cause security issues of cloud application (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA05 Lack Of Resource Isolation Of Cloud Application (from flow2)
threats.description: Lack of data, code, network isolation of cloud applications caused by misconfigurations and vulnerabilities of cloud infrastructure (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA06 Loss Of Security Control (from flow2)
threats.description: Loss of visibility and control of security and privacy of cloud application (partially controlled) (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA07 Poor Information Security Processes (from flow2)
threats.description: Poor information security processes of cloud provider (design, implementation and operations) (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA08 Audit And Certification Issues (from flow2)
threats.description: Audit and certification of cloud applications and infrastructure are inaccessible or restricted (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA09 Security Issues Of SLA (from flow2)
threats.description: Incorrect or unclear information security section of SLA (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA10 Service Provider Lock-In (from flow2)
threats.description: Service provider lock-in (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA11 Software License Issues (from flow2)
threats.description: Software license issues (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA12 Confiscation Of Computer Hardware (from flow2)
threats.description: Confiscation of computer hardware of cloud provider as a result of subpoena by law-enforcement agencies (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA13 Restrictions Of Forensic Readiness (from flow2)
threats.description: Restrictions of forensic readiness for cloud applications (e.g. access to low-level logs and background data, disclosure of client context) (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA14 Physical Access Or Theft Of Computer Equipment (from flow2)
threats.description: Unauthorized access or theft of computer equipment from data centre (because of flow2)

threats.title: BA15 Destruction Of Data Center (from flow2)
threats.description: Natural disasters destroy data centre or cloud infrastructure (Force Majeure) (because of flow2)

threats.title: DB01 Priviledge Escalation (from flow1)
threats.description: System services and applications suffer from privilege escalation (because of flow1)

threats.title: DB02 Remote Code Execution (from flow1)
threats.description: Remote code execution against network applications and services from Internet (because of flow1)

threats.title: DB03 Network Scanning (from flow1)
threats.description: Network and port scanning, service and version detection of VM from Internet (because of flow1)

threats.title: DC01 VM Escape (from flow2)
threats.description: VM suffers from process that escaped from another VM (VM Escape) (because of flow2)

threats.title: DC02 Cross-VM Side Channel (from flow2)
threats.description: VM suffers from a Cross-VM side channel attack (because of flow2)

threats.title: DC03 Hypervisor Vulnerabilities (from flow2)
threats.description: VM suffers from vulnerabilities of hypervisor (because of flow2)

threats.title: DC04 Unsafe VM Migration (from flow2)
threats.description: Loss or disclosure of information during VM migration (because of flow2)

threats.title: DC05 Rogue VM Image In Repository (from flow2)
threats.description: Uncontrolled placement of VM images (possibly with malicious content) in repository (because of flow2)

threats.title: DC06 Outdated VM Image In Repository (from flow2)
threats.description: Use of an outdated image for VM from repository (because of flow2)

threats.title: DC07 Lack Of Network Isolation (from flow2)
threats.description: Security issues of VM networking, caused by lack of network isolation (because of flow2)

threats.title: DC08 Unsafe VM Snapshots (from flow2)
threats.description: Security issues, related to management of VM snapshots (because of flow2)

threats.title: Generic DoS threat (from flow2)
threats.description: A generic DoS threat (because of flow2)

threats.description: A generic DoS threat (because of flow1)

threats.description: A generic information disclosure threat (because of flow2)

threats.description: A generic information disclosure threat (because of flow1)

threats.title: Generic tampering threat (from flow1)
threats.description: A generic tampering threat (because of flow1)

threats.title: AB01 Failure Of Cloud Application (from flow1)
threats.description: Unexpected failure of the cloud application (because of flow1)

threats.title: AB02 Connection Lost To Cloud Application (from flow1)
threats.description: Connection lost to the cloud application (because of flow1)

threats.title: AC01 Malware From Cloud Application (from flow1)
threats.description: Malicious content (malware) from the cloud application (because of flow1)

threats.title: AC02 Public Network Access To Cloud Application (from flow1)
threats.description: Remote user connects to the cloud application though a public network (e.g. Wi-Fi) and can be attacked by a third-party adversary (because of flow1)

threats.title: AC03 Social Engineering Against Remote User (from flow1)
threats.description: Remote user suffers from Social Engineering attacks, performed by third-party adversary (e.g. including the cloud application into phishing schema) (because of flow1)
